item.title: Starting today, the Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus are now available in China
item.description: Apple’s iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus will be offered in China starting October 17th through various channels like Apple’s website, physical stores, major carriers, and authorized retailers. These smartphones will also be available in 36 more countries and territories by the end of October, reaching a total of over 115 countries by the year’s end. Source: Apple. The iPhone 6 and the iPhone 6 Plus. Both iPhone models support TD-LTE and FDD-LTE, allowing customers to use 4G/LTE networks from China Mobile, China Telecom, and China Unicom throughout mainland China.
